A

addEnemy(EnemyModel, Posn) - Method in class boardMenu.BoardMenuView
Adds an enemy with a label, position, and the index of the image of the enemy list that was created to the screen when called.
addEnemyWithInt(JLabel, Posn, int) - Method in class boardMenu.BoardMenuView
Creates the images with a particular label, x and y position, and image of the enemy.
addTmpLabel(MouseEvent, TowerView) - Method in class boardMenu.BoardMenuCenterPanel
Adds a JLabel to the mouse when a button is clicked from the side panel and will follow the mouse around on the center panel.
addTmpLabel(MouseEvent, TowerView) - Method in class tutorial.TutorialCenterPanel
Adds a JLabel to the mouse when a button is clicked from the side panel and will follow the mouse around on the center panel.
addTowerToList(MouseEvent, String) - Method in class controller.GameController
Makes a new instance of the tower that is passed into the method and puts it into the tower arrayList.
addTowerToList(MouseEvent, String) - Method in class controller.TutorialGameController
Makes a new instance of the tower that is passed into the method and puts it into the tower arrayList.
addTowerToModel(TowerModel, Posn) - Method in class controller.GameController
Reduces the player money by the cost of the tower that is passed in.
addTowerToModel(TowerModel, Posn) - Method in class controller.TutorialGameController
Reduces the player money by the cost of the tower that is passed in.
